page.title: 03Games We Play By B.Fox
page.content: One of the most popular games we play is{Scrambling.}It is like follow the leader,except you lead them around difficult things like climbing up trees, jumping over a clump of nettles and swinging on branches. Another game we play is{Block 1,2,3.} In{Block 1,2,3}someone has to count to 61 while the others hide.Once he has finished counting he looks for the people who are hiding.If he finds someone he runs back to the post and shouts"{Block 1,2,3}see....whoever." But if the other person gets there first he shouts "{Block 1,2,3}all set free."All the people who have been caught are set free. The last one to be caught is it! { {
